articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il together with officers and men of the KPA enjoyed an art performance given by art groups of families of service persons of  KPA Units 526, 837, 564, 593, 963, 10215, 762 and Unit 7501 of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces that participated in the third round of the second-term contests among art groups of families of KPA service persons. 
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers of diverse genres as quartet "Eternal Is His Smile", quintet "Oh the Party You Are Our Joy", poem recital " Long Journey for Devotion", solo "I Am Wife of Officer," poem and story-telling " 'Everything Goes Well When Family Remains Harmonious' Is Our Eternal Motto", national instrumental ensemble "Ongheya for Songun Victory", story-telling with drums "Leap Higher and Faster" and chorus "If We Go with the General".
					
					 Kim Jong Il highly appreciated their successful performance, expressing great satisfaction over the fact that the members of the above-said art groups staged a splendid performance flawless in ideological contents and artistry with art works of great cognitive and educational value. He extended thanks to them.
					
					 All the numbers put on the stage serve as a good textbook for the revolutionary and working-class education as they make a profound ideological and artistic clarification of important socio-political issues arising in the struggle and life of the people in the Songun era by depicting the essential and significant aspects of the life, firmly based on the reality, he noted, repeatedly praising them for having staged the best performance. 
					
					　He said that it is the great pride of the WPK and the Korean people to have a large reliable contingent of women revolutionaries born in the era of Songun. 
					
					 Very excellent, indeed, are the spiritual world of the families of service persons, their work and life styles as they are living in a militant manner full of confidence and optimism about future,  he noted, urging all members of the society to earnestly learn from their noble spiritual world and work and life styles. 
					
					 He advanced important tasks that would serve as guidelines for intensifying the popular performing activities.
					
					 Among the audience were KPA General Kim Jong Gak, member of the NDC of the DPRK and first deputy director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, KPA General U Tong Chuk, member of the NDC of the DPRK, KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae, Ri Myong Su and Yun Jong Rin and other commanding officers of the army and armed forces organs, Jang Song Thak, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and department director of the WPK Central Committee, Secretaries Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam, Department Director Kim Kyong Hui, First Vice Department Director Ju Kyu Chang and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Meeting Marks 10th Anniversary of June 15 Declaration
articles.content:
Meeting Marks 10th Anniversary of June 15 Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the People's Palace of Culture Monday to mark the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Attending it were senior party and state officials, the chairpersons of the friendly parties, officials of social organizations, ministries and national institutions and in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media, members of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, the North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification, working people and youth and students in Pyongyang, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and Rev. Han Sang Ryol, a pro-reunification figure of south Korea, and overseas compatriots.
					
					 Present on invitation were diplomatic envoys of different countries, members of military attaches corps and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, recalled in his report delivered at the meeting that a north-south summit was held for the first time in 55 years since the division of the Korean nation and the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration the keynote of which is "By our nation itself" was published, stressing that this marked a great event recorded in the national history as it brought about a new historic turn in accomplishing the Koreans' cause of independent reunification. The reporter went on:
					
					 Guided by the idea of "By our nation itself" clarified by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, all the Koreans in the north and the south and overseas independently solved all the issues in line with the requirements and interests common to the nation, thus bringing about eye-opening events unimaginable in the past.
					
					 This was a striking demonstration of the validity and tremendous vitality, scientific accuracy and truth of the idea of "By our nation itself" clarified by Kim Jong Il, looking far into the future with his profound thinking and outstanding far-sightedness.
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula is so tense that an accidental single gun shot may trigger off an all-out war.
					
					 Defending the inter-Korean joint declaration and thoroughly implementing it is the only way of settling the grave situation created due to the reckless moves of the anti-reunification forces to provoke a war.
					
					 The puppet conservative group would be well advised to stop behaving recklessly, mindful that it will face a merciless punishment by the DPRK and have to pay a dear price if it shows any slightest move for "punishment" and "retaliation" in league with foreign forces. 
					
					 The U.S. and the Japanese reactionaries should stop at once all the hostile acts against the DPRK, properly understanding the burning hatred of the servicepersons and people and their strong resolution to wipe out the enemies. 
					
					 The reporter underlined the need for all the Koreans in the north and the south and overseas to wage a more dynamic struggle to frustrate the reckless moves of the U.S. imperialists and the puppet group to provoke a war and achieve the independent peaceful reunification of the country under the banner of "By our nation itself" with firm conviction and optimism about a rosy future of a reunified country.

articles.title: All-Korean Committee Issues Joint Statement
articles.content:
All-Korean Committee Issues Joint Statement
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The north side committee, the south side committee and the overseas side committee of All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration released a joint statement Monday on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the declaration. 
					 The statement says: 
					
					 The joint declaration is a supreme reunification declaration of the nation which opened up a bright prospect of achieving peace and reunification for the countrymen in their efforts to wipe out the distrust and antagonism that have lasted generation after generation.
					
					 After the publication of the declaration the Korean nation witnessed signal events unimaginable in the era of confrontation, which are the product of their protracted and strenuous efforts for its implementation.
					
					 The statement noted with concern that these precious fruits yielded in the course of implementing the June 15 joint declaration were brought to naught, creating such grave situation that military tension and the danger of war are escalating on the Korean Peninsula. For the Korean nation to thoroughly implement the joint declaration is the only way for it to settle the prevailing serious situation, preserve peace and achieve reunification, the statement says, and goes on:
					
					 No matter how hard and complicated the situation may become, we Koreans will tolerate neither foreign forces' interference in the reunification issue, the internal issue of the nation, nor their arbitrary practices against us but more dynamically advance toward independent reunification by our concerted efforts.
					
					 The nation's destiny and future, reunification and co-prosperity of the nation are thinkable only when there is peace.
					
					 We will decisively foil all sorts of moves to escalate the military tension and the confrontation between fellow countrymen going against the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 An event common to the nation could not be held to mark the 10th anniversary of the historic June 15 joint declaration because of the hostile policy towards fellow countrymen being enforced by the anti-reunification forces negating the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and pushing back the inter-Korean ties to those in the past era of confrontation.
					
					 The all-Korean committee will grandly hold events commemorating the anniversary in different parts in the north and the south and abroad and defend the June 15 era and develop it on a higher level.
					
					 The committee will give stronger impetus to the patriotic movement of the fellow countrymen for independent reunification and the great national unity with the unshakable will and faith in reunification, fully aware of noble mission it assumed before the era and the nation.
					
					 No force on earth can stop our advance towards national reconciliation and unity, peace and reunification along the road indicated by the joint declaration.
					
					 We ardently call upon all the fellow countrymen to dynamically turn out in the patriotic movement for peace and reunification in the basic spirit of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Photo Exhibition
articles.content:
Photo Exhibition
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- A national photo exhibition to commemorate the 10th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration took place at the People's Palace of Culture with due ceremony on Monday.
					 On display in the venue are over 150 photos dealing with the undying feats performed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the unshakable will of the Korean nation to achieve independent reunification without fail.
					
					 Among them are photos of Kim Jong Il signing the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration before exchanging it and those showing the leadership exploits performed by him by bestowing the great loving care to south Korean political and social figures and businessmen and leading them to the path of reconciliation, cooperation, unity and reunification.
					
					 Also on display are photos "A grand seminar for national reunification commemorating the first anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration", "Families and relatives in the north and the south have dream-like reunion benefiting from the June 15 joint declaration" and "A south Korean woman who gave birth to a baby girl at the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital".
					
					 Also displayed are photos showing fellow countrymen in their grand nation-wide movement for independent reunification under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself" and those dealing with the spirit of the army and people of the DPRK to resolutely smash the smear campaign of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean group of traitors for confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The ceremony was attended by Yang Hyong Sop, a chairperson of a friendly party, officials concerned and members of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and the North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification and working people in the city of Pyongyang and Rev. Han Sang Ryol, a pro-reunification figure of south Korea.
					
					 An Tong Chun, minister of Culture, made an opening address.

articles.title: Documentary Film Screened
articles.content:
Documentary Film Screened
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Korean documentary film "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il Meets with President Kim Dae Jung" was screened at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday.
					 The film was appreciated by senior state officials, chairpersons of friendly parties, officials of public organizations, ministries and national institutions, members of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and the North Headquarters of Pominryon and Pomchonghakryon, working people here. It was also watched by the chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, Rev. Han Sang Ryol, a pro-reunification figure of south Korea, overseas compatriots, diplomatic envoys of various countries and members of the military attaches corps here 
					
					 The film impressively shows that the north-south summit was provided for the first time in the history of national division and the June 15 joint declaration was published under the seasoned and tested leadership of Kim Jong Il who devoted his tireless efforts to realizing President Kim Il Sung's instructions for national reunification.
					
					 It contains scenes showing Kim Jong Il warmly greeting Kim Dae Jung at the airport and signing the joint declaration which reflects the aspiration and desire of all the compatriots for achieving the sacred cause of reunification by the concerted efforts of the nation.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- A new postage stamp has been issued in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to mark the 10th anniversary of the publication of the historic June 15 joint declaration between the north and the south of Korea.
					Seen in the upper part of the stamp is an inscription "In commemoration of the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration". The stamp reflects the will of Koreans in the north, the south and abroad to achieve an independent reunification of the country without fail on the basis of the declaration and in the spirit of "by our nation itself". 
					
					A sheetlet portraying varieties of dinosaurs has also been issued.

articles.title: Talks between DPRK and Egyptian Foreign Ministries
articles.content:
Talks between DPRK and Egyptian Foreign Ministries
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Talks between the visiting delegation of the DPRK Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the delegation of the Egyptian Ministry of Foreign Affairs were held in Cairo from June 12 to 13.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were the members of the delegation of the DPRK Ministry of Foreign Affairs headed by Vice-Minister Kim Hyong Jun and the DPRK ambassador to Egypt and from the Egyptian side the members of the delegation of the Egyptian Ministry of Foreign Affairs headed by Assistant Foreign Minister for Asian Affairs, Australia, New Zealand and Pacific Ahmed Amin Fathallah.
					
					 At the talks both sides informed each other of the situation in their countries and exchanged views on the matters of mutual concerns.

articles.title: WPK Hosts Reception for Tunisia PUP Delegation
articles.content:
WPK Hosts Reception for Tunisia PUP Delegation
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea hosted a reception for the visiting delegation of the People's Unity Party of Tunisia at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Monday.
					 Present there on invitation were the delegation headed by Secretary General Mouhammad Bouchiha.
					
					 Department Director Kim Yong Il and other officials of the C.C., WPK were on hand.
					
					 Kim Yong Il in a speech at the reception referred to the fact that the WPK and the People's Unity Party of Tunisia have closely supported and cooperated with each other from long ago after forging friendly ties.
					
					 He wished the People's Unity Party of Tunisia, in the path of social progress and prosperity, greater successes in its work to accomplish the cause of justice in the future, too.
					
					 Mouhammad Bouchiha in his speech noted that the DPRK has achieved successes in its efforts for defense of sovereignty and prosperity and happiness of its people. The People's Unity Party of Tunisia will express full support and solidarity with the heroic Korean people's struggle.

articles.title: Tunisia PUP Delegation Visits Statue of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Tunisia PUP Delegation Visits Statue of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the People's Unity Party of Tunisia headed by Secretary General Mouhammad Bouchiha visited the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill on Monday to pay reverence to him.
					 The guests laid a bouquet before the statue and paid tribute to him, out of their boundless admiration for Kim Il Sung who devoted his all to the prosperity of the country, the people's happiness and the human cause of independence.
					
					 The delegation arrived here by air today.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves for Czech
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves for Czech
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation of the Ministry of Railways headed by Minister Jon Kil Su left here for the Czech Republic on Monday to attend the 38th ministerial meeting of the Organization of Railways Cooperation. 
					 Arriving here today was a delegation of the Jilin Provincial People's Government of China headed by Vice-Governor Chen Weigen.

articles.title: World Blood Donor Day Marked
articles.content:
World Blood Donor Day Marked
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- An event for World Blood Donor Day took place in Pyongyang on Monday.
					 Present there were officials of the Ministry of Public Health, officials concerned and voluntary blood donors.
					
					 On hand were members of the WHO Mission, a member of the delegation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies active here, the Swedish ambassador to the DPRK and foreign guests.
					
					 At the event speakers referred to the significance of the day and the blood transfusion services that have been underway in cooperation with the WHO and the IFRC.
					
					 They stressed the need for the WHO to work well in line with the theme for this year.
					
					 Certificates were conveyed to the voluntary blood donors and a video was shown at the event.
					
					 The participants looked round photos on display and appreciated a performance given by an itinerant art squad of the Pyongyang Railway Bureau.

articles.title: Jo Yun Mi, Best Football Player of Asia
articles.content:
Jo Yun Mi, Best Football Player of Asia
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Jo Yun Mi, 23, is the top seed of the women's football team of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, which earned a berth for the 2011 FIFA Women's World Cup.
					 She was named the best player at the AFC Women's Asian Cup 2010 held in China some time ago.
					
					 She greatly contributed to the Korean team winning the 3rd FIFA U-20 Women's World Championships held in Russia in 2006. 
					
					 She, who began playing football at the sports group of her secondary school, was considered an up-and-coming footballer with good physical fitness and scoring sense already in her teens.
					
					 She, belonging to the April 25 Sports Team, is crowned with the titles of Labor Hero and People's Athlete.

articles.title: Light Comedy on Road
articles.content:
Light Comedy on Road
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The light comedy "Echo of Mountain" has been performed in different areas of the country. The light comedy, recreated by the State Theatrical Troupe, is honored with the Kim Il Sung Prize.
					 The light comedy is based on painstaking efforts of farmers in a mountainous area to boost grain output and turn their village into a beautiful place good to live in, and their worthwhile life.
					
					 It, originally created early in the 1960s, still enjoys a great popularity, making the people deeply aware of their mission of the time.
					
					 After seeing the performance Jang Min, 47, a department director of the North Hwanghae Provincial People's Committee, told KCNA he had realized that if officials failed in their duties, any good idea or intention could not be materialized.
					
					 Yun Chun Hwa, 40, chairwoman of the Management Board of the Chongsan Co-operative Farm in Kangso District, Nampho City, said the performance gave her the truth that only those working hard to realize high aims and ideal could be pioneers of the time. And she vowed to reap a rich harvest this year.
					
					 Ji Jong Ho, 50, a chief furnaceman of the Chollima Steel Complex, said that the performance representing people of the Chollima era made him deeply conscious of what he should do in the building of a thriving nation and that he would work hard with high aims and ideal as the heroes of the light comedy did.

articles.title: S. Korea-US-Japan "Cooperation" in Moves for War under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korea-US-Japan "Cooperation" in Moves for War under Fire
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet defence chief was reported to have cried for "taking a united action" and   slapping "independent sanctions" and the like as regards the case of the warship sinking that had been brought up for discussion at the UN Security Council at the "talks" held with their American and Japanese counterparts in Singapore on June 5. This was a very dangerous move to put a sort of "pressure" on the DPRK, backed by outsiders, and drive the situation to the brink of a war.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 This can never be overlooked as it is an action to push the racket for confrontation with the DPRK to an uncontrollable phase of explosion challenging the domestic and foreign public disclosing the sinister inside story about the case.
					
					 The south Korean puppet military hawks are now busy with the moves to stage the already postponed large-scale "combined anti- sub exercise" with the U.S. in waters of the West Sea at any cost as part of the "military counter-actions" over the case of warship sinking. They are mulling introducing a Patriot missile unit into south Korea in pursuance of their involvement in the U.S. "missile defense system". All these moves are nothing but premeditated moves to start a war of aggression against the DPRK by escalating the tension and beefing up the armed forces while posing a military threat to it in collusion and nexus with foreign forces.
					
					 What merits more serious attention is that the south Korean conservative group is pushing forward the formation of a "triangular military alliance" with the U.S. and Japan in real earnest.
					
					 The recent talks held on the initiative of the south Korean puppet group are a revelation of an extremely bellicose scenario to fully knock into shape the above-said "alliance" under the pretext of the case and use it for preempting an attack on the DPRK in case its attempt to pressurize it through the UN forum proves futile.
					
					 Should the Lee Myung Bak group dare unleash a war of aggression against the DPRK despite its repeated warnings, its army and people will give full rein to the might of Songun built up in every way, blow up the strongholds of the aggressors and accomplish the historic cause of national reunification.

articles.title: IAEA Chief's Comment Blasted
articles.content:
IAEA Chief's Comment Blasted
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Yukiya Amano, director-general of the International Atomic Energy Agency, addressing a meeting of its Board of Governors which opened in Vienna on June 7, let loose a string of balderdash getting on the nerves of the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 Amano's remarks are nothing but piffle let loose by an imbecile. If he is interested in settling the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula, he had better know well about its essence and history, to begin with, and behave himself from an impartial stand.
					
					 The DPRK is neither a member nation of the IAEA nor a signatory to the NPT. It has never recognized the partial "resolution" of the UNSC.
					
					 Amano is free to let loose a spate of reckless remarks his own way only to betray his ignorance of the history of the nuclear issue on the peninsula. The said issue, in essence, surfaced because the United States shipped its nuclear weapons into south Korea and has threatened the DPRK with them for more than half a century.
					
					 Amano, not knowing about this, vociferated about the DPRK's fulfillment of "its commitment," the implementation of the Safeguards Accord and the like. This is nonsensical and such preposterous rhetoric will not work on anyone.
					
					 It is ridiculous for him to talk nonsense in a bid to create the impression that he is "interested" in the resumption of the six-party talks. The talks have not been resumed entirely due to the attitude of the U.S. and south Korea.
					
					 One cannot but doubt whether Amano will properly operate an international organization as he thoughtlessly echoes what the U.S. utters, unaware of the above-said facts. He is orchestrating the charade aimed to increase pressure upon the DPRK as a mouthpiece and marionette of the U.S., seriously misinterpreting the essence and history of the above-said issue from the stance of a U.S. follower.   This behavior will only harm his position as the director-general of the IAEA and tarnish its image.

articles.title: DPRK-targeted War Exercises to Be Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
DPRK-targeted War Exercises to Be Staged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- It was announced that the First Corps of the south Korean puppet army would stage large-scale exercises in the areas of Koyang and Phaju, Kyonggi Province on June 15 and 16, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The puppet warmongers are planning to hurl all troops of the corps and huge military equipment of various types into the said DPRK-targeted war exercises, a drill allegedly to cope with "infiltration" and "provocation" by someone.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors seeks to ignite a war at any cost while escalating the inter-Korean confrontation as the days go by.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Ethiopia
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- A seminar on General Secretary Kim Jong Il's famous work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism" was held by the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea and a seminar on his exploits by the Arada Branch of the group on June 2 and 3 to mark the 46th anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					Displayed in the venues of the seminars were celebrated works of President Kim Il Sung and 
						Kim Jong Il, photos on their immortal feats and books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					The secretary general of the group said that Kim Jong Il's work expounds the original idea that priority should be given to ideological work over everything else with main stress put on ideology in accomplishing the socialist cause.
					
					Today Korean socialism remains unfazed despite the imperialists' moves to stifle it, and this is a vivid manifestation of the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il holding fast to ideology as the main thing in every work and the validity and vitality of his work, he stressed.
					
					The chief of the Arada Branch of the group said that invincible is the harmonious whole of the Korean people faithful to the guidance of Kim Jong Il who has devoted his all to the happiness of the people.

articles.title: US and S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Moves Flayed
articles.content:
US and S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Moves Flayed
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Party of Bangladesh issued a statement on June 7 in denunciation of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities' anti-DPRK moves.
					 Condemning the south Korean authorities for having orchestrated at the U.S. instigation the case of the sinking of warship "Cheonan" against the DPRK, the statement said:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, who suffered a crushing defeat in the Korean War in the 1950s by the heroic Korean people led by President Kim Il Sung, have made frantic efforts to bring down the socialist system of the DPRK.
					
					 They imposed sanctions on the DPRK under the pretext of the nuclear issue, but failed to reduce the DPRK to submission. So, they raised the warship sinking case this time.
					
					 We strongly demand the cancellation of the fabricated "results of investigation" into the case and urge the imperialists to stop the conspiratorial scheme against the DPRK.
					
					 We call upon all the people loving global peace to extend support to the Korean people in the just struggle against the imperialists' aggression moves. 
					
					 We express support and solidarity once again with the just struggle of the Korean people guided by the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle for Reunification Supported
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle for Reunification Supported
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The Czech, Moravian, Silesian Trade Unions' Association of the Czech Republic issued a statement on June 8 on the occasions of the 10th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 Expressing full support and solidarity with the Korean people in the struggle for the implementation of the joint declaration and the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, the statement said:
					
					 The inter-Korean relations are now inching close to the extremely dangerous phase owing to the U.S. and the south Korean authorities' hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The inter-Korean declaration, which gave the whole world the hope for peace and detente on the Korean Peninsula and cooperation between the north and the south, has been reduced to a scrap of paper and the situation of the peninsula is at the dangerous state in which another Korean war may break out.
					
					 In order to heal the crisis prevailed on the peninsula and prevent the danger of a war, it is necessary to conclude a peace treaty between the DPRK and the U.S., lift the unfair sanctions against the DPRK and immediately withdraw the U.S. troops from south Korea.
					
					 Regarding the joint declaration as the milestone for Korea's reunification, the association expresses full support and solidarity with the Korean people's efforts for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: Stand to Implement Inter-Korean Declarations Reiterated
articles.content:
Stand to Implement Inter-Korean Declarations Reiterated
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in the Far Eastern Region of Russia issued a statement on June 7 to mark the 10th anniversary of the historic June 15 joint declaration.
					 The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration made it possible for all Koreans to dynamically wage the reunification movement by their united efforts and gave the overseas compatriots, in particular, the confidence that the homeland would be certainly reunified in the near future, the statement noted, and said:
					
					 But, this confidence was mercilessly trampled by the south Korean conservative "government", which has driven the situation of the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war by orchestrating the warship sinking case to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 Such treacherous and separatist actions of the south Korean authorities should never be tolerated.
					
					 The confederation will more valiantly turn out in the righteous nation-wide struggle to implement the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration in the future, too, and strongly denounce and reject any moves obstructive to their implementation.

articles.title: Acto central por 10o aniversario de Declaracion Conjunta de 15 de Junio
articles.content:
Acto central por 10o aniversario de Declaracion Conjunta de 15 de Junio
Pyongyang, 14 de junio (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 14 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 10o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio.
					 Participaron los cuadros del partido y el Estado, los presidentes de partidos amigos, los funcionarios de las entidades sociales, ministerios, organos centrales y sectores de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los miembros del comite norteno para la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y de las direcciones nortenas de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria y la Alianza Pannacional de Jovenes y Estudiantes por la Reunificacion de la Patria, trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes capitalinos.
					
					Tambien figuraban el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, el pastor surcoreano pro-reunificacion Han Sang Ryol y compatriotas en ultramar. 
					
					 Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos, los miembros del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares y los delegados de organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea.
					
					  El miembro suplente del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Yang Hyong Sop, senalo en el informe que la Cumbre Norte-Sur, realizada por primera vez a los 55 anos de division nacional, y la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta N-S del 15 de Junio, cuyo nucleo es el ideal "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", fueron un evento nacional que registro un nuevo viraje historico en el cumplimiento de la causa de reunificacion independiente de nuestra nacion.
					
					  Los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar comenzaron a resolver todos los problemas de manera independiente conforme a la demanda y los intereses comunes de la nacion, ateniendose al ideal "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", aclarado por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, preciso el informante y prosiguio:
					
					De esa manera, pudieron propiciar acontecimientos inimaginables en el pasado. 
					
					 Todo esto manifiesta claramente la justeza, la gran vitalidad, la veracidad y el caracter cientifico de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", ideal que aclaro el Dirigente con su larga prevision y profundas reflexiones. 
					
					 Ahora, en la Peninsula Coreana se crea la crisis a punto de explosion que puede terminar en la guerra total por un simple tiro accidental. 
					
					  La unica via para superar esta situacion grave creada por las imprudentes maniobras belicas de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion reside en defender y ejecutar a cabalidad la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					
					  Si la banda conservadora titere muestra algun indicio de "castigo" y "venganza", en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras, probara el despiadado castigo de la RPDC. 
					
					  Ella debe actuar con prudencia teniendo presente que sus movimientos anti-RPDC le costaran muy caros.
					
					EE.UU. y los reaccionarios japoneses deben parar ahora mismo todas sus acciones hostiles a la RPDC dandose clara cuenta de que nuestro ejercito y pueblo les odian mucho y estan dispuestos a aniquilar a los enemigos. 
					
					  Con el optimismo y la firme conviccion en el radiante futuro de la patria reunificada, todos los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben desplegar con mas dinamismo la lucha por lograr la reunificacion independiente y pacifica de la patria, bajo la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" frustrando las imprudentes maniobras de los imperialistas norteamericanos y los titeres surcoreanos encaminadas a provocar una nueva guerra de agresion contra la RPDC.

articles.title: Inaugurada la foto-exhibicion por efemeride coreana
articles.content:
Inaugurada la foto-exhibicion por efemeride coreana
Pyongyang, 14 de junio (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia 14 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la foto-exhibicion central por el 10o  aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					En la ocasion fueron exhibidas mas de 150 fotos alusivas a las imborrables hazanas del Dirigente  Kim Jong Il y a la invariable voluntad de la nacion coreana de lograr sin falta la reunificacion independiente.
					
					Entre ellas se ven las fotos del Dirigente firmando la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio e intercambiando su texto.
					
					En las otras se constata la hazana realizada por el cuando conducia a las personalidades del circulo politico y social y los empresarios del Sur de Corea a la senda de reconciliacion, cooperacion, unidad y reunificacion dispensandoles grandes benevolencias.
					
					Ademas, atraen la atencion las fotos intituladas "El simposio de la reunificacion nacional por el primer aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio", "Los familiares y parientes separados en el Norte y el Sur que se reunen gracias a la aprobacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio", "Mujer surcoreana que dio a luz a su hija en la Casa de Maternidad de Pyongyang". 
					
					Las otras fotos muestran la gigantesca lucha de los coreanos levantados en el movimiento por la reunificacion independiente bajo la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" y el temperamento del ejercito y el pueblo dispuestos a frustrar tajantemente la campana intrigante y conflictiva anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y la banda traidora surcoreana.
					
					En la ceremonia inaugural de esta galeria fotografica estuvieron presentes Yang Hyong Sop, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios correspondientes, los miembros del Comite Norteno por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y de las direcciones nortenas de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria y de la Alianza Pannacional de Jovenes y Estudiantes por la Reunificacion de la Patria, los trabajadores capitalinos y el pastor surcoreano partidario de la reunificacion Han Sang Ryol.
					
					El ministro de Cultura An Tong Chun pronuncio discurso de la ocasion.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre delegaciones de cancillerias de Corea y Egipto
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre delegaciones de cancillerias de Corea y Egipto
Pyongyang, 14 de junio (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar los dias 12 y 13 en El Cairo las conversaciones entre la delegacion del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, de visita en Egipto, y la del MINREX de este pais africano.
					En la ocasion participaron por la parte coreana los miembros de la delegacion del MINREX encabezada por el vicecanciller Kim Hyong Jun y el embajador coreano en la Republica Arabe de Egipto, y por la egipcia, los miembros de la delegacion del MINREX presidida por el asistente del ministro de RR.EE. encargado de asuntos de Asia, Australia, Nueva Zelanda y Pacifico, Ahmed Amin Fathallah.
					
					Ambas partes se informaron de la situacion de sus respectivos paises e intercambiaron criterios sobre los problemas de interes mutuo.

Visitas

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun comenta disparate de Amano
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun comenta disparate de Amano
Pyongyang, 14 de junio (ATCC) -- En la reunion de la junta de los administradores de la Agencia Internacional de Energia Atomica (AIEA), iniciada el dia 7 en Viena, Austria, el director general Yukiya Amano pronuncio un discurso muy provocativo a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El diario Rodong Sinmun difundio este lunes un comentario individual que refuta el prejuicio de  Amano.
					
					Si el esta interesado de veras en la solucion del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana, debera asumir la posicion imparcial en base al entendimiento correcto de la esencia y el curso de desenvolvimiento del tema, aconseja el comentarista y continua:
					
					La RPDC no es miembro de la AIEA ni signatario del Tratado de No Proliferacion. Ademas, nunca habia reconocido la "resolucion" parcial del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU. 
					
					Amano esta hablando comoquiera en cuanto al problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana sin saber ni jota de la evolucion de este asunto.
					
					Este problema tiene su origen en la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. sobre la RPDC que perdura mas de medio siglo desde que el primero introdujo en suelo surcoreano sus armas nucleares. 
					
					Sin embargo, Amano insistio absurdamente en que la RPDC debe cumplir un supuesto "deber" y observar el convenio de garantia.
					
					Lo mas ridiculo del caso es que ese charlatan hablo como si tuviera "interes" en la reanudacion de las conversaciones a 6 bandas.
					
					Ignorando que EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea son culpables de la no-reanudacion de esa cita, Amano ajusta a ciegas su criterio a lo que dice el imperio.
					
					Esta conducta servil a EE.UU. hace sospechar de su capacidad de dirigir imparcialmente esa organizacion internacional.
					
					Lo que se buscara el con presionar a la RPDC tergiversando seriamente, en calidad de portavoz de EE.UU., la esencia y el curso del problema nuclear, sera el descredito de si mismo y de la organizacion de que es director general.
